creator: Buildup 2020, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Buildup for Android not only simplifies and enhances field construction management it also helps ensure construction project teams have integrated access to all the tools they require on their construction site - using smartphone, or any other computer via the web. By means of the Buildup app - project managers, engineers, construction inspectors along with work managers can easily perform required quality tests, report faults, share and edit both documents and plans, view progress reports in real time, and much more - all within the responsive and intuitive interface of the Buildup Android app.

********************************************************

Key features:

- Issues Management / Punch List
A practical fault resolution system, available through reporting and management. - All the documents and plans regarding your project are available at your fingertips. As well, all active documents are automatically synced to the latest version shared between your construction team members, and it is easy for any member to update these documents and plans by adding markups or text. As well, each project is allowed an unlimited number of documents which can easily uploaded via the web as well as or smartphone

- Checklists/Inspections
The ability to carry out quality tests and inspections swiftly intuitively. Checklists are easily generated and modified via the web and may include pass/fail tests, relevant photos, additional text, dates or signatures as needed.   

- Advanced Reporting
Real time reports are available to all users, detailing both how the project has progressed and its current status. These detailed reports allow the analysis of issues that may be holding up project progress, and if required, presenting information on such issues to whatever level of detail that is needed. 

- Notifications
Real time notifications, which aid project team members in increasing their productivity and enhancing the progress of your project, helping to solve the issues that require immediate attention to individuals or groups over the course of the project. 

- Messaging System
An enhanced messaging system, which ensures authorized team members are able to communicate with each other regarding the entire project or any specific unit as needed. All such communication is documented and saved in the cloud for any needed access or auditing you may require to help keep your project on track.

- Documents and Plans
All the relevant documents for the project are always synced and up-to-date from the within app or the website. It is easy to upload documents from everywhere, scribble or write over any PDF or photos, and share them with the relevant people.

 - Contractors Management
The added ability to manage sub-contractors as well as tools to allow you to view their associated faults.

 - Multiple projects
Buildup app is also able to support multiple projects, based on your construction company’s requirements. 

Learn more: http://buildup.co
descriptionShort: Buildup is a field collaboration system for construction managers and developers

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fixed a compatibility issue with Android 12.
Thanks for using Buildup!
